title: 5 Small Space Gardening Tips and Tricks! // Balcony Vegetable Gardening for Beginners

tasks.task: Plant care on a balcony garden
subtasks: Utilize vertical space for plant containers
Water plants sustainably using self-watering planters or watering hacks
Intensively plant herbs and vegetables with dwarf varieties
Choose appropriate plant varieties suitable for containers and balcony spaces
Consider sun exposure and shade when positioning plants
Enjoy the garden and learn from experiences
